title: Are we the baddies?

title: The force-feeding of AI features on an unwilling public
author: imartin2k
aiHeadline: AI is now force-feeding you features like pop-up ads, but instead of 'click here,' it's 'click your brain.'

title: Hannah Cairo: 17-year-old teen refutes a math conjecture proposed 40 years ago

aiHeadline: 17-year-old math prodigy proves that 40-year-old conjectures are just conjectures, and she's the real deal.
